resources.string:
85G wholewheat Penne
1 tbsp Rapespeed Oil
1 Large Pepper
2 frozen,skinless wild salmon fillets (about 120g each) 
1 lemon
2 garlic Cloves
1 shallot
2 tbsp capers
6 Kalamata Olives
1 tsp extra virgin olive oil
2 handfuls of rocket

You will need:
1 frying pan
1 cooking pan
1 large bowl
You will need to:
Roughly chop the pepper 
Zest and Juice the Lemon
Finely grate the garlic
Very finely Chop the shallot
Pit and Slice the olives
